about_the_game:
"He" is a game that combines elements of horror, RPG, and puzzle-solving. The story is set in a hospital where a tragic incident occurred four years ago, turning the hospital into an "empty building." Journalist Qiqi, in pursuit of exclusive news, ventures alone into this hospital. However, as the investigation deepens, the so-called "truth" seems to gradually vanish into the dark corners of the hospital.

Game Features

  • Ingenious scene design and sound effects create a tense and thrilling horror atmosphere, immersing players in a captivating horror experience.
  • Combining RPG and puzzle-solving elements, you will unravel the mysteries behind the hospital through reflection and investigation, propelling the story forward.
  • Diverse puzzle scenes are incorporated, requiring deduction, searching for clues, and solving puzzles to advance the game's narrative.
  • Set in a hospital of the 1980s, the game authentically recreates the social background, medical environment, and cultural atmosphere of that era, adding a sense of history and unique regional characteristics to the game.

content_descriptors.notes: In “He“, there are frequent scenes of bloodshed and horrific depictions of human body mutilation. All such scenes are presented in a 2D pixel art style, but may still have a realistically triggering impact on players with potential sensitivities. Player discretion is advised.

short_description: Journalist Qiqi, eager for exclusive news, decides to delve into an enigmatic hospital surrounded by rumors. Upon stepping inside, she finds herself shrouded in layers of mist, each step guiding her deeper into the hospital, as if poised to reveal the entire truth.
